mapper.select: SELECT classroom_id AS "classroomId", classroom_name AS "classroomName" FROM classroom WHERE kindergarten_id = #{kindergartenId}
SELECT classroom_id as "classroomId", classroom_name as "classroomName", kindergarten_id as "kindergartenId" FROM classroom WHERE classroom_id = #{classroomId}
select classroom_name AS classroomName from classroom c, teacher t where t.teacher_id = #{teacherId} AND (c.classroom_id = t.classroom_id)
select c.classroom_id AS classroomId from classroom c, teacher t where t.teacher_id = #{teacherId} AND (c.classroom_id = t.classroom_id)

SELECT classroom_id AS classroom_Id, classroom_name AS classroomName, kindergarten_id AS kindergartenId from classroom where classroom_id = ( SELECT classroom_id AS classroomId FROM TEACHER WHERE teacher_email = #{teacherEmail})
select c.classroom_name AS classroomName, c.classroom_id AS classroomId from kindergarten k JOIN classroom c on k.kindergarten_id = c.kindergarten_id where k.admin_id=#{adminId}
select classroom_name AS classroomName from classroom where classroom_id = #{classroomId}

select c.classroom_id AS classroomId from admin a, kindergarten k, classroom c where (a.admin_id = k.admin_id AND k.kindergarten_id = c.kindergarten_id) AND a.admin_id = #{adminId} AND c.classroom_name=#{classroomName}

select akcrt.classroom_id AS classroomId, akcrt.classroom_name AS classroomName, akcrt.teacher_name AS teacherName, crc.count AS count from (select akcr.kindergarten_id, akcr.classroom_id, akcr.classroom_name, crt.teacher_name from (select ak.kindergarten_id AS kindergarten_id, kcr.classroom_id AS classroom_id, kcr.classroom_name AS classroom_name from ((select k.kindergarten_id AS kindergarten_id from admin a JOIN kindergarten k on a.admin_id = k.admin_id ) ak JOIN (select k.kindergarten_id AS kindergarten_id, cr.classroom_id AS classroom_id, cr.classroom_name AS classroom_name from kindergarten k JOIN classroom cr on k.kindergarten_id = cr.kindergarten_id) kcr on ak.kindergarten_id = kcr.kindergarten_id)) akcr JOIN (select t.classroom_id AS classroom_id, t.teacher_name AS teacher_name from classroom cr JOIN teacher t on cr.classroom_id = t.classroom_id) crt on akcr.classroom_id = crt.classroom_id) akcrt JOIN (select c.classroom_id, count(child_id) as count from classroom cr JOIN child c on cr.classroom_id = c.classroom_id group by c.classroom_id) crc on akcrt.classroom_id = crc.classroom_id where akcrt.classroom_id = #{classroomId}
select count(c.classroom_id) AS count from kindergarten k Join classroom c on k.kindergarten_id = c.kindergarten_id where k.kindergarten_id = #{kindergartenId}
